data.title: Forums
data.description:
London Fixed Gear and Single-Speed is a community of predominantly fixed gear and single-speed cyclists in and around London, UK.

This site is supported almost exclusively by donations. Please consider donating a small amount regularly.

item.title: Miscellaneous & Meaningless
item.description: Non-bike-related stuff in here only. That way those who want the bike stuff can choose to block this category and ignore the off-topic stuff.

item.title: Classifieds
item.description: All classifieds adverts, as well as chat about classifieds and eBay finds.

item.title: Bikes & Bits
item.description: New bikes, old bikes, bike appreciation, component and cycle reviews, bike porn, etc.

item.title: Bike Storage: Wall mounts, stands, lock-ups, sheds, etc.
Rides & Races
item.description: Social rides, group rides, alleycats, pro-races, Tour de France, club rides, audaxes, roller racing, polo, etc.

item.title: Bike Polo
item.description: London and International Hard Court Bike Polo and the London Bike Polo League.

item.title: What's going on in the Poloverse
Current Projects
item.description: Building a new bike, converting a bike, or do you just want to see what others have done?

item.title: Cities and Places
item.description: There is a whole world outside of London

item.title: Social
item.description: Beers, fun rides, stuff we do to kick back or to party.

item.title: North Drinks. Every Tuesday 6pm - The Flask (ft Death TT)
Mechanics & Fixin'
item.description: Building a bike through to correcting a problem and re-building after a crash. Everything mechanical in here.

item.title: Anyone know anything about disc brakes?
Announcements, Help & Testing
item.description: Questions on how the forum runs, announcements made about the forum, bug reporting, and a general play area if you need to, er, practise posting?

item.title: The things you can do with search
Track Cycling and Velodromes
item.description: This is what track bikes are for, hitting Herne Hill or an indoor velodrome, track racing and training.

item.title: 2016-02-13 - Rider and pedestrian down, Old Street
LFGSS Ladies
item.description: A forum for women specific rides, attire, equipment, chat and socialising.

item.title: LFGSS Ladies Drinks - 1st Thursday of the Month, The Captain Kidd, Wapping
Cycle Touring
item.description: Cycle touring diaries and advice, travelling with a bike nationally and internationally, holidays with a bike, etc.

item.title: Airline Baggage Regulation / Flying with Bikes
Freestyle & Tricks
item.description: Jumps, bar spins, BMX, Fixed Gear London, you know the deal...

item.title: BMX - Lets see your little bikes.
LFGSS Cycling Club
item.description: A British Cycling affiliated club (LFGSS CC).

item.title: Travel & Trips
item.description: Travel that doesn't necessarily involve bicycles. We can't always be riding the French Alps..
